# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(lab4_datagen LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(lab4_datagen "")
set_target_properties(lab4_datagen PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "lab4_datagen")
set_target_properties(lab4_datagen PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_compile_options(lab4_datagen PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(lab4_datagen PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(lab4_datagen PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(lab4_datagen PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(lab4_datagen PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(lab4_datagen PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET lab4_datagen PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(lab4_datagen PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(lab4_datagen PRIVATE
    datagen/main.cpp
)

# target
add_executable(lab4_scheduler "")
set_target_properties(lab4_scheduler PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "lab4_scheduler")
set_target_properties(lab4_scheduler PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_compile_options(lab4_scheduler PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(lab4_scheduler PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(lab4_scheduler PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(lab4_scheduler PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(lab4_scheduler PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(lab4_scheduler PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET lab4_scheduler PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(lab4_scheduler PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(lab4_scheduler PRIVATE
    scheduler/main.cpp
    scheduler/lab4_calender.cpp
)
